name: Pushbullet
description: This module allows Gladys to send you notification on every device thanks to PushBullet !
instructionsHTML:
Need Gladys version >= 3.0.0.

Installation

To install this module, you need to :

  • Install the module in Gladys
  • Without rebooting Gladys, go to "Parameters" => "Parameters" in the dashboard, and create a UserParam with the name "pushbullet_token", with your Pushbullet Access Tokens inside. (you can find it on Pushbullet website)
  • You can now reboot Gladys.
  • Go to "Parameters" in the dashboard, then "Notifications", and you can here put pushbullet in the list of notification handlers.
